channel.title: Background noise really loud in Mass Effect
channel.description: Yesterday, I bought Mass Effect on steam, and after it downloaded, I start to play it. One thing really bugged me, however, The background noises were way too loud, and I couldn't hear anything that the people were saying. I tried turning down the volume in the audio options, but it still stayed too loud. Anyone know how to fix this? This is the steam version, if that helps.

item.title: Background noise really loud in Mass Effect
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
You have to upgrade your ears later in the game.

Or just upgrade your audio drivers or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Background noise really loud in Mass Effect
